summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York, dated September 22, 2021. The sender reports having reviewed 114 documents on a Relativity platform for the case, mentions finding a household manual/handbook for an upcoming Monday interview, and references Maxwell phone records and FedEx business records certificates.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Recipient of the email, works in the Southern District of New York at One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY. The sender is providing case-related updates and documents to this attorney.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding case document review
events.description: An email is sent to an Assistant United States Attorney summarizing the review of 114 documents on a Relativity platform, mentioning the discovery of a household manual and Maxwell phone records.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The sender has reviewed 114 documents on a Relativity platform for the case, which include FBI files and other materials.
A household manual/handbook (attached as 2005-02-14_HOUSEHOLD_MANUAL.pdf) was found and is intended for use in an interview scheduled for the upcoming Monday.
The correspondence mentions the existence of Maxwell phone records and FedEx business records certificates as part of the case materials.
